description.russian: Слова и фразы на корейском языке.
description.english: Words and phrases in the Korean language.

descriptions.russian: гигант, великий человек (네 안에 잠든 거인을 깨워라 - разбуди в себе гиганта) (giant)
найстойчиво, искренне, страстно (earnestly, eagerly, ardently, sincerely, heartily)
не смотря на что-либо (disregard, be not deterred)
высота волны, уровень напряжения (height of wave)
чрезмерность, нелогичность (unreasonableness, irrationality, ―하다 (be) unreasonable, unfair, unnatural)
в такой степени, на таком расстоянии (that much)

description.english: Words and phrases from Disco Elysium videogame

descriptions.english: -Glasses are cool, I guess. -Are they? They're mostly just ____________.
_______ is someone with limited or no ability to use the lower half of their body.
You must forgive me! I'm getting so ___________! I completely forgot to introduce myself.
Her eyes glitter over the ____ of her glasses as she looks up, smiling.
We shouldn't waste any more time on it. If you want my take, ask me after we've ________ the victim.
The kitchen is closed until 13:00 because the cook is working. You can _____ around after that - if you must.
You're barking up the wrong ____. I don't have a key.
Just the nastiest and loudest faction He tosses his head in _______.
To have a lot of noise
To have the water go off
To be in a relationship: go out
To have many opportunities for advancement/promotion
To not be able to imagine
To not know how time has passed
A dynasty in Tree Kingdom era of Korea
To meet with a view toward marriage
Newlywed home, first house after marriage
Newlywed home, first house after marriage
To have a rumor come out

be in a state of stagnation
join the ranks of advanced countries

descriptions.english: open the era of a $10,000 per capita income

descriptions.english: a situation where internal problems are compounded by external difficulties

descriptions.russian: Не отрываясь, полностью погрузиться во что-либо
descriptions.english: without a break, to be completely immersed in something

descriptions.russian: Предмет или событие, явление которого не продолжается долго, из-за шаткой основы (튼튼하지 못하여)
descriptions.english: an object, event, or phenomenon that doesn't last long due to an unstable foundation

descriptions.russian: Способность заранее предугадать события из будущего
descriptions.english: the ability to foresee events from the future in advance

descriptions.russian: Череда неудач или трудностей, возникающая друг за другом
descriptions.english: a series of misfortunes or difficulties happening one after another
a futile theory with unlikely practical implementation
experience a sharp rise in oil prices
